title: Volkswagen's Seat brand to hire 250 more staff at Spanish plant
text:
April 30, 2018 / 11:11 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago Volkswagen's Seat brand to hire 250 more staff at Spanish plant Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BERLIN (Reuters) - Volkswagenâ€™s ( VOWG_p.DE ) Spanish division Seat on Monday said it would hire 250 more workers at its plant near Barcelona to respond to plans to increase production. FILE PHOTO: The Volkswagen logo is seen on a vehicle at the New York Auto Show in the Manhattan borough of New York City, New York, U.S., March 29, 2018. REUTERS/Shannon Stapleton
Seat, which returned to profit in 2016 for the first time in about a decade, has recently expanded capacity at the Martorell factory to 2,400 cars per day from 2,300 to service growing demand for its models.
The carmaker also said it has agreed with labour unions to run additional production shifts on weekends in coming months. Reporting by Andreas Cremer
